components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We've become aware of a potential issue with SMS delivery delays to multiple networks in multiple countries. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights dashboards visualization partner in the Chicago, U.S. is conducting a planned maintenance on September 16th, 2023, at 1:00 AM Pacific Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 3 hours. During the maintenance window, loads will be impacted while Flex Insights dashboard will be available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind (Tre)

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind (Tre) Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 17 September 2023 at 2:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Verify Silent Network Auth

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body:
The Zain network in Iraq is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 16 September 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Zain Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

incident_updates.body: The Omantel network in Oman is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 September 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 17 September 2023 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Omantel Oman handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a series ofplanned maintenances from 18 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

18 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 18 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT
20 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 20 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT
25 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT
27 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT

The Lifecell network in Ukraine is conductinga planned maintenance from 18 September 2023 at 16:00PDT until 18 September 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Lifecell Ukraine handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 19 September 2023 at 02:00 PDT until 19 September 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The XL network in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 19 September 2023 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XL Indonesia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 19 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Three UK, H3G Austria, and Wind (Tre) Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 20 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 21 September 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK, H3G Austria and Wind (Tre) Italy customers.Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup SIM Swap - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup Identity Match - Three UK, Wind (Tre) Italy

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 September 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 22 September 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, September 23rd, 2023, at 1:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Deutsche Telekom

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Deutsche Telekom is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 24 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Deutsche Telekom customers.
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 24 September 2023 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent disconnections and call failures to and from Singapore phone numbers.

Our SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent SMS delays delivering to and from France handsets via a subset of France longcodes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2023 at 16:30 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Mobifone network in Vietnam is conducting an emergency maintenance from 14 September 2023 at 07:00 PDT until 15 September 2023 at 07:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Mobifone Vietnam handsets.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The K-Cell network in Kazakhstan is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 September 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 15 September 2023 at 08:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to K-Cell Kazakhstan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
